com.bumptech.glide.presenter
Interface ImagePresenter.ImagePresenterCoordinator

All Known Implementing Classes:
ThumbImagePresenter
Enclosing class:
ImagePresenter<T>
public static interface ImagePresenter.ImagePresenterCoordinator

An interface used to coordinate multiple ImagePresenter objects acting on the same view

Method Detail

canSetImage

boolean canSetImage(ImagePresenter presenter)
Determines if a presenter can display a loaded bitmap

Parameters:
presenter - The presenter requesting permission to display a bitmap
Returns:
True iff the presenter can display a bitmap
